basic.blooming: Succulent plants, often open white flowers in autumn
basic.color: Leaf color green and will turn red with adequate sunlight

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sunlight, resistant to half shade，temporary dormancy in summer, planted in half shade
maintenance.watering: Strong resistant to drought, water thoroughly when the soil is dry, water every 1-2 month
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
